extension.description: Sets the audio and subtitle track according to your language preferences
Ställer in ljud- och undertextspår enligt dina språkinställningar
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the Language Preference Manager thread on the Kodi forum.
För buggar, önskemål eller allmänna frågor, besök tråden Language Preference Manager på Kodi-forumet.
extension.news: 1.0.7 : - New option to always prefer Original audio tracks if present. Based on a list e.g: eng,ger,fre If one is found we force activate it and skip usual audio preference evaluation. Uses 'isoriginal' tag. - Add Swedish translation in Addon.xml (Thanks to Yeager) - Custom Conditional Subs preferences : new -ff tag to prioritize Forced flagged subtitles e.g: Jpn:Eng-ff - Fix a bug in Custom Conditional Subs : when no preference matched, default subtitles stayed on despite option turn_subs_off - Avoid running multiple instances of the LPM addon - Use logger.py across all modules. Cleanup. Fix minor bug in settings.xml.
